intro: Acanthospermum xanthioides var. glabratum, commonly known as the smooth thornweed, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and the Middle East. The smooth thornweed is adapted to survive in harsh environments, showing resistance to drought and poor soil conditions.
